S04n357:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sucandro gṛhapatiḥ,
S04n357:2: tenopasaṃkramya sucandrasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n357:3: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n357:5: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātītī |
S04n357:6: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n357:8: āha-mayā kulaputra vimalajñānaprabho nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ |
S04n357:10: kiṃ mayā śakyamapramāṇavimokṣapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum ||
S04n357:16: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sucandrasya gṛhapateḥ pādua śirasābhivandya sucandraṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sucandrasya gṛhapaterantikātprakrāntaḥ ||48 ||
